test_sum01.generated_summary: Customer’s Orders shall be confirmed by the Seller in writing. The Contract shall become binding upon receipt by the Customer of the Seller’s order Confirmation and the delivery schedule shall become effective upon receipt of the down-payment when relevant.

test_sum011.generated_summary: In no event shall the Parties be liable for any indirect, consequential, incidental, special or punitive damages of any kind including loss of use or profit loss of assets loss of asset value loss resulting from business disruption loss of goodwill or loss of contractual opportunity.

test_sum013.generated_summary: AH owns all foreground intellectual property and know-how generated by the outcome of the analysis of the Data, Processed data and Anonymous data.

test_sum014.generated_summary: The content and time schedule of the training courses shall be confirmed at the time of signature of the Contract.

test_sum015.generated_summary: Training Means mean the Helicopter, the tools, the simulator, the infrastructure and the equipment used by the Seller to perform the Training Service(s).

test_sum016.generated_summary: The Seller reserves the right to cancel any training courses that does not meet the minimum enrolment quota defined in the Purchase Order. The Customer will be notified of the cancellation at least 30 days prior to the scheduled dates of the training session. The Seller may propose another training session or reimbursement of the payment already made by the Customer.

test_sum017.generated_summary: The Customer shall be responsible for loss of and damage to the Seller’s property and to the Customer’s Training Means and personnel.

test_sum019.generated_summary: The Seller may perform the Training Services at its convenience.

test_sum02.generated_summary: In case the Customer requires a Quotation from the Seller the Contract shall become binding when the Seller receives the Customer’s written approval of such quotation issued without changes.

test_sum020.generated_summary: The Customer agrees not to install or use the software on any computer or other hardware.

test_sum021.generated_summary: At the time of the signature of the Contract or at the latest ten days before flight Training start the Customer shall provide the Seller with a certificate of insurance containing this specific provision.

test_sum022.generated_summary: All Seller’s Wet Training session documentation and notes are provided in English unless otherwise agreed in the Contract.

test_sum023.generated_summary: Each Party remains solely and exclusively responsible for the information exchanged and shall take any appropriate action in order to comply with the applicable laws and regulations.

test_sum024.generated_summary: The Customer shall hold the Seller harmless from and against any consequences of any third party claim based on a breach of the above mentioned warranties or resulting from any other breach of this Contract.

test_sum025.generated_summary: The SaaS and/or DaaS is designed to perform the services and functions as described in the service or product specification. In case of error or defect the Customer shall provide all necessary information and documentation in its possession under the form of a written notification to the Seller to enable this latter to investigate such error. The Seller will remedy such errors or defects by providing a correction release or finding a reasonable workaround solution.

test_sum026.generated_summary: If the Technical Data information is not provided by the Customer the Seller may perform the R&O Service according to the technical data in force.

test_sum027.generated_summary: It is understood between the Parties that the Seller shall carry out the R&O Service in its own workshops or have such reconditioning carried out by a Seller selected workshop.

test_sum028.generated_summary: The exchange Part becomes the Customer’s property and the removed one becomes the Seller’s Property. The Customer cannot request return of the removed Part (Core Unit).

test_sum029.generated_summary: On Customer’s request the Seller is prepared to carry out an investigation on the Part sent to the Seller. In this case the Seller will charge the Customer for the costs incurred even if the Customer chooses not to have the work performed by the Seller’s warranty.

test_sum03.generated_summary: Any changes or configuration changes requested by the Customer require prior mutual written agreement of the Parties and may lead to an adjustment of the price and/or delivery time.

test_sum030.generated_summary: Unless otherwise specified, to be eligible under warranty the alleged failure must have occurred within the time-limits mentioned here-after for any pre-owned Helicopter which is not sold by the Seller in an “as-is” condition: Within five hundred (500) flying hours or 12 months after acceptance at the delivery location.

test_sum031.generated_summary: This training is granted to the Customer personally and cannot be transferred or assigned to any third party.

test_sum032.generated_summary: The following expenses shall be borne by the Customer: Coverage of ground and in-flight risks incurred by its personnel and risks arising from the civil liability of its personnel Travelling expenses from the Customer’s location to the place of training and back Living and travelling expenses in the country where the training takes place.

test_sum033.generated_summary: Reasonable insurance coverage of risks arising from Training will be included in the Seller’s insurance policy. During Training Flights and Technical Training, except in case of wilful misconduct or gross negligence the Seller shall effect and maintain an insurance coverage to cover on ground and during the flight time frame: all property damage to the Products, all damages, losses, injury or death of any person, including but not limited to passengers for the purpose of the Training flights, except the personnel of the Customer and any loss or damage to any property.

test_sum034.generated_summary: For training planned with simulation, if a flight simulator is not available and/or simulator training is not in accordance with the regulations of Customer’s national civil aviation authorities, simulator flight hours will be replaced by Helicopter flight hours.

test_sum035.generated_summary: The Seller’s technical representatives fluent in English or French will remain subject to their national labour regulations. They will only be available for five working days per week without exceeding eight and half (8:30 hours per day and forty one and half (41:30 hours per week).

test_sum036.generated_summary: This on-site support shall be provided at the Customer’s choice. Either at the time of the first basic inspection or at any given time chosen by the Customer but no later than 15 months after acceptance of the last Helicopter delivered to the Customer under the Contract.

test_sum037.generated_summary: More generally on any SaaS the Customer acknowledges and agrees that the Customer and the Saas users shall abide by the General Conditions of Use (GCU). The Customer also ensures that all Saa S users comply with the relevant GCU.

test_sum038.generated_summary: Unless otherwise specified the Customer’s authorization shall be assumed as given for necessary maintenance or other necessary test flights and ground runs without additional agreement.

test_sum039.generated_summary: If the Seller needs to send the BFE/CFE parts to the original equipment manufacturer for any reason such as modifications, unit conversion software upgrade and so on, if the Original Equipment manufacturer while performing the service finds necessary to calibrate the parts to regain airworthiness, this shall be charged to the Customer by the Seller.

test_sum04.generated_summary: In addition, when French law is applicable as per article 15, the Customer shall be liable to the Seller for a fixed amount of forty (40) Euros for cost recovery fees pursuant to French code of commerce article L. 441-6. If the actual costs incurred by the Seller in recovering unpaid sums exceed 40 Euros the Seller shall be entitled to ask for additional compensation upon producing evidence of such actual costs.

test_sum040.generated_summary: The Helicopter shall be handed over by the Customer at the Seller’s or subcontractor’s facilities in airworthiness condition with its complete and updated documentation and flight manual. All components followed on using up should have enough potential to release the Service and for the release into service.

test_sum041.generated_summary: In the event of any conflict between the following documents forming part of the purchase order the following order of precedence applies.

test_sum044.generated_summary: Prior to the purchase order signature date the Supplier shall identify the Export Regulations applicable to the Products and/or Services and notify the Purchaser in writing using the form provided by the purchaser (the “electronic export control classification declaration” “eECCD”).

test_sum047.generated_summary: The Parties confirm and agree that any personal data (as defined in the General Data Protection Regulation (EU) 2016/679) exchanged in connection with the purchase order has been collected and will be exchanged as independent data controllers (“Controller”).

test_sum049.generated_summary: Any dispute that the Parties fail to resolve amicably within a period of 3 months shall be brought exclusively before the courts of Paris (France).

test_sum050.generated_summary: This Loan Agreement shall not be amended except by a specific agreement signed by duly authorized representatives of the Parties.

test_sum06.generated_summary: Transfer of ownership of the Product shall be subject to the prior fulfilment by the Customer of its obligations in particular full payment of the balance of the total contractual amount of the corresponding Product and interest.

test_sum07.generated_summary: From the transfer of ownership to the Customer the Customer shall effect and maintain an appropriate insurance coverage including but not limited to a hull all risk and hull war risk insurance.
